===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=てんのうへいか|天皇|tr1=tennō|t1=emperor|陛下|tr2=heika|t2=majesty}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

{{ja-pron|yomi=o|てんのう へいか|acc=5|acc_ref=DJR}}
